keystore.title: Key Store
keystore.desc1: Store all of your keys or redemption links here.
keystore.desc2: You can refine your giveaways more using the tier system by giving you keys a tier value.
keystore.desc3: A: High Value - B: Mid Value - C: Low Value - D: Other
keystore.caption: Note: All keys are stored with encryption that only either the winner or users with the "View Keys" permission can see.
keystore.deleteWarn: Warning! Deleting this key will also remove the key from the viewers store! (If this key was already claimed)
